Text: Bring those MiniDiscs to the cinema if you're gonna wath it there - and send me the recording at ONCE!!!
FUCK the 1st of July real good, my Swedish brothers and sisters, as soon as I have one with the english audio, I'll post it.. EAT MY SHORTS, APB!! I'll start using a good proxy...

I've watched the 30 first minutes of the release, then my 'polare' had to DRAG me away from the telly, because HE didn't want to watch this GREAT MOVIE made by some dude called Spielberg with Tome Cruise chatting in russian... LOL! Sample is in average poorer than the complete, which I give a 7 on the TS-quality.. RUSSIAN REVOLUTION!!

and Anakata, FIX the code for TPB so it allows the use of the OPERA browser! Not that I mind using FF, it's just that after using OPERA for a couple of months, I dont want to switch to FF just to up a torrent at TPB - something I have to do now...
..and yes, it's time for a war between this world and  the MPAA-world!
